movies.title: L'Elan de Noël
movies.plot: When his father cannot make it home Max is convinced that Christmas will be extremely boring this year. But then Mr. Moose crashes through his roof and he is not so sure anymore. This is a giant talking Moose with a big mouth, a warm hearth and a tendency for drama. He claims he was on a test-run with Santa Claus, lost control over the sleigh and crashed, injuring his leg. And now he has to find Santa Claus, otherwise nobody will receive their Christmas gifts. Is Max able to get Mr. Moose and Santa flying again?
movies.simplePlot: When his father cannot make it home Max is convinced that Christmas will be extremely boring this year. But then Mr. Moose crashes through his roof and he is not so sure anymore. This is a ...

biography.bio: Dennis Reinsma is an actor, known for L'Elan de Noël (2013), The Little Gangster (2015) and Swchwrm (2012).
biography.name: Dennis Reinsma

biography.bio: Dana Goldberg is an actress, known for L'Elan de Noël (2013), Vrolijke Kerst (2014) and De Troon (2010).
biography.name: Dana Goldberg

biography.birthName: Jeroen Bernardus Jozef Nicolaas van Koningsbrugge
biography.bio: Jeroen van Koningsbrugge was born on September 3, 1973 in Roosendaal, Noord-Brabant, Netherlands as Jeroen Bernardus Jozef Nicolaas van Koningsbrugge. He is an actor and writer, known for Force (2014), Riphagen (2016) and The Surprise (2015). He has been married to Marie-Claire Witlox since August 18, 2005. They have two children.
biography.name: Jeroen van Koningsbrugge

biography.bio: Jelka van Houten was born in Culemborg, Netherlands, on 1 September 1978, as the second daughter of Margje Stasse (presently on the board of Dutch educational TV Teleac) and film historian / musicologist Theodore van Houten. She is the only sister of actress Carice van Houten (b. 1976). In the eighties, both young girls made their first stage appearances in school plays in Utrecht and on Dutch TV in a KRO children's programme, produced by Stefan Stasse. A multi-talent, Jelka played the role of an obsessed killer in Liefje (2001), when she was a set design student at the Dutch Film Academy.
biography.name: Jelka van Houten

biography.bio: Arjan Ederveen was born on September 9, 1956 in Hilversum, Noord-Holland, Netherlands. He is an actor and writer, known for Still Smokin (1983), Theo en Thea en de ontmaskering van het tenenkaasimperium (1989) and Filmpje! (1995).
biography.name: Arjan Ederveen

biography.bio: Derek de Lint was born on July 17, 1950 in The Hague, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands as Dick Hein de Lint. He is an actor and director, known for Soldier of Orange (1977). He has been married to Dorith Jessurun since 1979. They have three children.
biography.name: Derek de Lint

biography.bio: Carla Hardy was born on March 11, 1956 in Utrecht, Utrecht, Netherlands as Carolien Johanna Hardy. She is an actress, known for The Ninth Hour (2000), Gebroken spiegels (1984) and L'Elan de Noël (2013).
biography.name: Carla Hardy

biography.bio: Mylena Barrios was born in the beautiful city of Key West, lives in Miami, but has Latin roots, speaks perfect Spanish, has a beautiful family that always support her. Carries artistic blood through her veins, various family members are very talented; acting, singing, modeling and design. One day after seeing on TV a beauty contest, at 3 years old Mylena decided she wanted to become an actress and model. She has been professionally prepared with Supermodel Skylar Starks, Alicia Faccio Academy, John Casa Blanca, Tu Escenario Sahkids, Sametag among others. And after attending the company Logamodel with Ms. Preudhomme she felt she was ready to pursue acting, modeling and design seriously and make a career. She has made many bilingual national and international commercials in USA; KFC. ATT, Home Depot, Burger King, Uvideos, Univision, Pattern Painter, NY Pizza Cones, Floam, Beamz with singer Flo Rida, Kingsford, Telefutura, Disney, El Dorado Furniture and more. In the run she has modeled for Barbie Mattel, Gymboree, Old Navy, Children's Place, Keith Amari, Lourdes Atencio and several designers. Her most recent work was in the American series, Bloodline in which she is part of the Diaz family and is available in Nextflix, In Spanish for Venevision she was part of the cast of Ruta 35 series that soon will air on TV, other series are Americas Most Wanted and documentary films Mourning Wood, Bad English was the best humorous documentary film in the US and that this short film was in France as one of the best documentary film, also Mylena has excellence in Taekwondo first grade black belt. Another passion is playing the piano and has had the honor of playing in various events such as Miss USA and Miss America. She has participated in several music videos with Jeyro Camacho, Keith Amari, Graciela Aybar. With over 10 plays with major roles with the grandmaster Miguel Sahid of Actoral Society Hispanoamericanade Sahkids She runs a virtual radio program pangeafm.com the pangeakids show that is heard live every Saturday from 11 am to 12 noon ET .
biography.name: Mylena Barrios

biography.bio: Brian Herring is known for his work on Hellboy II: The Golden Army (2008), Star Wars: The Force Awakens (2015) and Fur TV (2004).
biography.name: Brian Herring

biography.bio: Claes Månsson was born on February 5, 1950 as Claes Göran Månsson. He is an actor, known for Yrrol - En kolossalt genomtänkt film (1994), Heartbreak Hotel (2006) and Welcome to Sweden (2014).
biography.name: Claes Månsson

biography.bio: Erik Sundqvist is an actor, known for L'Elan de Noël (2013).
biography.name: Erik Sundqvist

biography.bio: Luc Theeboom is an actor, known for The Purse Snatcher (1995), Alfie le petit loup-garou (2011) and Den Helder (2008).
biography.name: Luc Theeboom

biography.bio: Mats van den Geer is an actor, known for L'Elan de Noël (2013).
biography.name: Mats van den Geer

biography.bio: Huug van Tienhoven is an actor, known for The Arm of Jesus (2003), Saint (2010) and Circus 3D (2011).
biography.name: Huug van Tienhoven
